title: Kerning in postscript 1
content:
I am designing a font that has alternate characters. I have assigned kerning to those characters. When i generate it as a postscript font, i loose the kerning values for the alternate chracters. I am placing these characters in 0172, 0174, 0165, 0169. I am running fontographer on xp proffesional. Does anybody know if postscript does not allow kerning on those character cells?   
Thank you for your help.   
Chuck Borges
author: anonymous
